definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: get or take as a possession (cf. Gerber:236 ff.; Ecclus [[נחל]] Sir 45:22 b +; NH id. (rare));—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: land of Canaan, Ex 23:30 (E), Ex 32:13 (J), Is 57:13, Ez Eze 47:14; Zoin and Judah Ps 69:37.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: special sections in the land, of tribes and individuals, [[נחל נחלה]] Jos 17:6 (J); ´[[נחלה אשׁר נ]] De 19:14 (D), Nu 35:8 (P), cf. Jos 14:1 (P); without acc., have or get a (landed) property, Nu 18:20, Nu 18:23, Nu 18:24, Nu 26:55, Nu 32:19, Jos 16:4, Jos 19:9, (all P), Ju Jdg 11:3.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: land of Moab and Ammon by conquest Zep 2:9; landed property [[בכל הנוים]] Ps 82:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: God takes possession of Israel as his private property Ex 34:9 (J); Judah Zec 2:16.
fig. have or get as a possession, property: testimonies Ps 119:111, glory Pr 3:35, good things Pr 28:10, lies Je 16:19, wind Pr 11:29, simplicity Pr 14:18.
divide the land for a possession, Nu 34:17, Nu 34:18, Jos 19:49 (all P; incorrect pointing for Piel, so S.S).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: divide for a possession: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִחַל]] Jos 13:32; 3 pl. [[נִחֲלוּ]] Jos 14:1, Jos 19:51; Inf. [[נַחֵל]] Nu 34:29 (all P); also Nu 34:17, Nu 34:18, Jos 19:49 (v.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[הִתְנַחֲלוּם]] Is 24:2; 2 mpl. [[הִתְנַחַלְתֶּם]] Le 25:46, Nu 33:54; Impf. [[תִּתְנַחֲלוּ]] Nu 34:13, Ez Eze 47:13; [[תִּתְנֶחָָלוּ]] Nu 33:54; Inf. [[הִתְנַחֵל]] Nu 32:18; possess oneself of land (acc.), Nu 33:54, Nu 34:13 (P) Ez Eze 47:13; [[נחלה]] Nu 32:18 (P); slaves Le 25:46 (P) Is 14:2; abs., ref. to land Nu 33:54 (P); all c. [[לְ]] pers. (for whose benefit), exc. Nu 32:18, Nu 34:13, Is 14:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: land of Canaan (given by ´[[י]] or his servants), acc. pers. et rei, De 1:38, De 3:28, De 12:10, De 19:3, De 31:7, Jos 1:6 (all D), Je 3:18, Je 12:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: various things, acc. pers. et rei, espec. blessings, Zec 8:12, 1Sa 2:8, Pr 8:21; acc. rei Is 49:8; acc. pers. De 32:8.
cause to inherit, give as an inheritance, c. acc. pers. et rei, De 21:16; acc. pers. + [[מן]] rei, Ez Eze 46:18; acc. pers. Pr 13:22; [[ל]] pers. 1Ch 28:8.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[הָנְחַלְתּי]] Job 7:3 made to possess, c. acc. rei, e.g. months of vanity.
